attributes.action: Help more with the costs of childcare
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a  married mother of 2 i am finding it hard to afford to put my children into nursery. the cost of this is £1200 per month. My husband earns a total income of £1500 per month. How are we meant to pay the bills???? You want us to return to work but you tell me why? I'd be paying more than i earn for childcare!!!!!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
